title: The Deserter

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Assassinate someone during the day. Guess their role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The town will be informed of the Deserter's looming presence at the start of the game.
-  When you assassinate someone, they will take an unstoppable attack if you guessed correctly.
- You only have 3 uses of Assassination.
- You may only attempt to assassinate once per day.
- You cannot assassinate someone if the vote count has reached a majority.
- You cannot assassinate on day 1.
